title: Feature Rules
description: Each feature rule controls exactly one feature and serves as the root of a chain of feature data.

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

oneOf.description: Expression for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).  Mutually exclusive with random distribution object below.
Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).  Mutually exclusive with Molang expression above.

extent.title: Extent
extent.description: Represents the range of values on which that distribution operates, from minimum to maximum.

C.title: Molang Number
C.description: The minecraft molang definition that results in a float.

all_of.title: All Of
all_of.description: All tests in an `all_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.title: Any Of
any_of.description: One or more tests in an `any_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.title: None Of
none_of.description: All tests in a `none_of` group must fail in order for the group to pass.

all_of.title: All Of
all_of.description: All tests in an `all_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.title: Any Of
any_of.description: One or more tests in an `any_of` group must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.title: None Of
none_of.description: All tests in a `none_of` group must fail in order for the group to pass.

H.title: Subject
H.description: The subject of this filter test.

F.title: Actor Health
F.description: Tests the health of the subject.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the health of the subject.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

I.title: All Slots Empty
I.description: Returns true when the designated equipment location for the subject entity is completely empty.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the designated equipment location for the subject entity is completely empty.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

BA.title: Any Slots Empty
BA.description: Returns true when the designated equipment location for the subject entity has any empty slot.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the designated equipment location for the subject entity has any empty slot.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

BB.title: Bool Property
BB.description: Returns true when the bool actor property matches the value provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the bool actor property matches the value provided.

domain.description: (Required) The property name to look for
domain.title: Operator

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

BC.title: Clock Time
BC.description:
Compares the current time with a float value in the range (0.0, 1.0).
0.0= Noon
0.25= Sunset
0.5= Midnight
0.75= Sunrise

test.title: Test Property
test.description:
Compares the current time with a float value in the range (0.0, 1.0).
0.0= Noon
0.25= Sunset
0.5= Midnight
0.75= Sunrise

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

BD.title: Distance To Nearest Player
BD.description: Compares the distance to the nearest Player with a float value.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Compares the distance to the nearest Player with a float value.

BE.title: Enum Property
BE.description: Returns true when the enum actor property matches the value provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the enum actor property matches the value provided.

domain.description: (Required) The property name to look for
domain.title: Operator

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

BF.title: Float Property
BF.description: Returns true when the float actor property matches the value provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the float actor property matches the value provided.

domain.description: (Required) The property name to look for
domain.title: Operator

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

BG.title: Has Ability
BG.description: Returns true when the subject entity has the named ability.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity has the named ability.

BH.title: Has Biome Tag
BH.description: Tests whether the biome the subject is in has the specified tag.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the biome the subject is in has the specified tag.

BI.title: Has Component
BI.description: Returns true when the subject entity contains the named component.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity contains the named component.

value.description: (Required) The component name to look for.
value.title: Value

BJ.title: Has Container Open
BJ.description: Returns true when the subject Player entity has opened a container.

CA.title: Has Damage
CA.description: Returns true when the subject entity receives the named damage type. has_damage can also use subject and operator parameters but they are optional.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity receives the named damage type.

CB.title: Has Equipment
CB.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

value.description: The item name to look for.
value.title: Value

CD.title: Has Equipment Tag
CD.description: Tests for the presence of an item with the named tag in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of an item with the named tag in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

value.description: The item name to look for.
value.title: Value

CE.title: Has Damaged Equipment
CE.description: Tests for the presence of a damaged named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of a damaged named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

value.description: The item name to look for.
value.title: Value

CF.title: Has Mob Effect
CF.description: Tests whether the Subject has the specified mob effect.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject has the specified mob effect.

CH.title: Has Equipment
CH.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.

test.description: Tests for the presence of a named item in the designated slot of the subject entity.
test.title: Test

CI.title: Has Property
CI.description: Tests for the presence of a property of the subject entity.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests for the presence of a property of the subject entity.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

value.title: Value
value.description: (Required) The property name to look for.

CJ.title: Has Ranged Weapon
CJ.description: Returns true when the subject entity is holding a ranged weapon like a bow or crossbow.

DA.title: Has Silk Touch
DA.description: Tests if the subject is holding an item with silk touch.

DB.title: Has Tag
DB.description: Returns true if the subject entity has the tag provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity has the tag provided.

DC.title: Has Target
DC.description: Returns true if the subject entity has a valid target.

DD.title: Has Trade Supply
DD.description: Tests whether the target has any trade supply left. Will return false if the target cannot be traded with.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the target has any trade supply left. Will return false if the target cannot be traded with.

DE.title: Home Distance
DE.description: Tests the distance between the subject and its home. Returns false if the subject has no home or if their home is in a different dimension.

DF.title: Hourly Clock Time
DF.description: Compares the current 24 hour time with an int value in the range[0, 24000].

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Compares the current 24 hour time with an int value in the range[0, 24000].

value.description: (Required) An integer value set between 0 and 24000.
value.title: Value

DG.title: In Block
DG.description: Returns true when the subject entity is inside a specified Block type.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is inside a specified Block type.

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

DH.title: In Caravan
DH.description: Returns true if the subject entity is in a caravan.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is in a caravan.

DI.title: In Clouds
DI.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in the clouds.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in the clouds.

DJ.title: In Contact With Water
DJ.description: Returns true when the subject entity in contact with any water: water, rain, splash water bottle.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity in contact with any water: water, rain, splash water bottle.

EA.title: In Lava
EA.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in lava.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in lava.

EB.title: In Nether
EB.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in Nether.

EC.title: In Overworld
EC.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in Overworld.

ED.title: In Water Or Rain
ED.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water or rain.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water or rain.

EE.title: In Water
EE.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is in water.

EF.title: Inactivity Timer
EF.description: Tests if the specified duration in seconds of inactivity for despawning has been reached.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

EG.title: Int Property
EG.description: Returns true when the integer actor property matches the value provided.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the integer actor property matches the value provided.

domain.description: (Required) The property name to look for
domain.title: Operator

subject.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.
subject.title: Subject

EH.title: Is Altitude
EH.description: Tests the current altitude against a provided value. 0= bedrock elevation.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current altitude against a provided value. 0= bedrock elevation.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

EI.title: Is Avoiding Mobs
EI.description: Returns true if the subject entity is fleeing from other mobs.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is fleeing from other mobs.

EJ.title: Is Biome
EJ.description: Tests whether the Subject is currently in the named biome.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject is currently in the named biome.

FA.title: Is Block
FA.description: Returns true when the block has the given name.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

FB.title: Is Bound To Creaking Heart
FB.description: Tests that the Creaking Heart that spawned the subject Creaking still exists.

FC.title: Is Brightness
FC.description: Tests the current brightness against a provided value in the range (0.0f, 1.0f).

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current brightness against a provided value in the range (0.0f, 1.0f).

value.description: The brightness value to compare with.
value.title: Value

FD.title: Is Climbing
FD.description: Returns true if the subject entity is climbing.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is climbing.

FE.title: Is Color
FE.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the named color.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the named color.

FF.title: Is Daytime
FF.description: Returns true during the daylight hours.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true during the daylight hours.

FG.title: Is Difficulty
FG.description: Tests the current difficulty level of the game.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests the current difficulty level of the game.

value.description: The game's difficulty level to test.
value.title: Value

FH.title: Is Family
FH.description: Returns true when the subject entity is a member of the named family.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true when the subject entity is a member of the named family.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

FI.title: Is Game Rule
FI.description: Tests whether a named game rule is active.

value.description: Tests whether a named game rule is active.
value.title: Value

FJ.title: Is Humid
FJ.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with humidity.

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with humidity.

GA.title: Is Immobile
GA.description: Returns true if the subject entity is immobile. An entity is immobile if it lacks AI goals, has just changed dimensions or if it is a mob and has no health.

GB.title: Is In Village
GB.description: Tests whether the Subject is inside the bounds of a village.

GC.title: Is Leashed To
GC.description: Returns true if the subject entity leashed to the calling entity.

GD.title: Is Leashed
GD.description: Returns true if the subject entity is leashed.

GE.title: Is Mark Variant
GE.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the mark variant number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

GF.title: In Nether
GF.description: Tests if the subject is not at full health.

GG.title: Is Moving
GG.description: Returns true if the subject entity is moving.

GH.title: Is Owner
GH.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the owner of the calling entity.

GI.title: Is Persistent
GI.description: Tests if the subject's persistence matches the bool value passed in.

GJ.title: Is Riding Self
GJ.description: Returns true if the subject entity is riding the calling entity.

HA.title: Is Riding
HA.description: Returns true if the subject entity is riding on another entity.

HB.title: Is Skin Id
HB.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the skin id number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

HC.title: Is Sleeping
HC.description: Tests whether the Subject is sleeping.

HD.title: Is Sneak Held
HD.description: Returns true if the subject entity has the sneak input held.

HE.title: Is Sneaking
HE.description: Returns true if the subject entity is sneaking.

HF.title: Is Snow Covered
HF.description: Tests whether the Subject is in an area with snow cover.

HG.title: Is Sitting
HG.description: Returns true if the subject entity is sitting

test.title: Test Property
test.description: Returns true if the subject entity is sitting.

HH.title: Is Target
HH.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the target of the calling entity.

HI.title: Is Target
HI.description: Tests whether the current temperature is a given type.

value.description: The Biome temperature catagory to test.
value.title: Value

HJ.title: Is Temperature Value
HJ.description: Tests the current temperature against a provided value in the range (0.0, 1.0) where 0.0f is the coldest temp and 1.0f is the hottest.

value.description: The Biome temperature value to compare with.
value.title: Value

IA.title: Is Underground
IA.description: Returns true when the subject entity is underground. An entity is considered underground if there are non-solid blocks above it.

IB.title: Is Underwater
IB.description: Returns true when the subject entity is under water. An entity is considered underwater if it is completely submerged in water blocks.

IC.title: Is Variant
IC.description: Returns true if the subject entity is the variant number provided.

value.description: The altitude value to compare with.
value.title: Value

ID.title: Is Vehicle Family
ID.description: Returns true when the subject entity's vehicle is a member of the named family.

value.title: Value
value.description: The Family name to look for.

IE.title: Is Visible
IE.description: Returns true if the subject entity is visible.

IF.title: Is Waterlogged
IF.description: Tests if the subject block is submerged in water.

IG.title: Light Level
IG.description: Tests is the mob is outside of the specified light level range (0, 16).

IH.title: Moon Intensity
IH.description: Compares the current moon intensity with a float value in the range (0.0, 1.0)

II.title: Moon Phase
II.description: Compares the current moon phase with an integer value in the range (0, 7).

IJ.title: On Ground
IJ.description: Returns true when the subject entity is on ground.

JA.title: On Ladder
JA.description: Returns true when the subject entity is on a ladder.

JB.title: Random Chance
JB.description: Returns true if the random chance rolls 0 out of a specified Maximum range.

JC.title: Rider Count
JC.description: Returns the number of riders on this entity.

JD.title: Surface Mob
JD.description: Tests if the subject is a surface mob.

JE.title: Taking Fire Damage
JE.description: Tests if the subject is taking fire damage. Requires the damage_sensor component

test.title: Test
test.description: Tests if the subject is taking fire damage. Requires the damage_sensor component

JF.title: Target Distance
JF.description: Tests the distance between the calling entity and its target.

JG.title: Owner Distance
JG.description: Tests the distance between the subject and its owner. Returns false if there is no owner.

JH.title: Trusts
JH.description: Returns true if the subject is trusted by entity.

JI.title: Weather At Position
JI.description: Tests the current weather, at the actor's position, against a provided weather value.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

JJ.title: Weather
JJ.description: Tests for the current weather state the entity is experiencing.

value.description: The Family name to look for.
value.title: Value

BAA.title: Y Rotation
BAA.description: Returns the Y rotation of this entity.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of this feature rule.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The name of this feature in the form `namespace_name:feature_name`. `feature_name` must match the filename.

places_feature.title: Places Feature
places_feature.description: Named reference to the feature controlled by this rule.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Parameters to control where and when the feature will be placed.

placement_pass.title: Placement Pass
placement_pass.description: When the feature should be placed relative to others. Earlier passes in the list are guaranteed to occur before later passes. Order is not guaranteed within each pass.

minecraft:biome_filter.title: Biome Filter
minecraft:biome_filter.description: List of filter tests to determine which biomes this rule will attach to.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: Parameters controlling the initial scatter of the feature.

coordinate_eval_order.title: Coordinate Eval Order
coordinate_eval_order.description: The order in which coordinates will be evaluated. Should be used when a coordinate depends on another. If omitted, defaults to `xzy`.

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: Number of scattered positions to generate.

oneOf.description: Probability (0-100] that this scatter will occur.  Not evaluated each iteration; either no iterations will run, or all will.
Probability numerator / denominator that this scatter will occur.  Not evaluated each iteration; either no iterations will run, or all will.
